info.name: Remove the Edit Main Toolbar Menu
info.description:
Removes the Edit menu.  This is the second menu drop down list item in Firefox.
Gives you more room for extension toolbars, or buttons.   Works for Firefox 2 & Firefox 3

*Thanks, user 4639

Integrates with:
- Style 7653
- Style 7652
- Style 7651
- Style 7650
- Style 7649
- Style 8024


Additional Information:
This style works for both Firefox3 and Firefox2.
Gives you the ability to only enable the menus you use the most!

Changelog:
- Initial Release
